meanings.definition: A type of lightweight fabric made from wool or wool and cotton.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful delaine dress to the party.
meanings.sent2: The delaine fabric was soft and comfortable against her skin.
meanings.sent3: The delaine material fluttered in the breeze like a gentle cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her delaine scarf was as light as a feather, yet warm.
meanings.sent5: The delicate delaine fabric shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: To make or dress in delaine fabric.
meanings.sent1: She delained the gown for the fashion show.
meanings.sent2: They delaine the curtains with care and precision.
meanings.sent3: He delained the costume in record time, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: The tailor delained the suit, transforming it into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: Delaining the tablecloth added a touch of elegance to the dining room decor.
